main event: An unidentified object was observed travelling from south to north at Misawa AB, Japan on 23 March 1961.
interesting points: The object had no perceptible means of propulsion and exhibited an erratic height with a pulsating effect,The object seemed to disappear and reappear at will.,The sighting was recorded as part of a project and submitted to various military headquarters.,The observer described a pulsating orange flame and a contrail-like appendage that evaporated quickly.,The duration of the sighting was approximately 6 minutes, with one confirmed object observed.
sighted object: an unidentified object with a pulsating orange flame
witness description: the observer is a very reliable weather observer
